channel.title: Fit Facts
channel.description:
Our Host, Harry Mitterbauer, breaks down the common misconceptions in fitness by bringing on experts in every sport. Harry will not hesitate in telling you what you think is bull. He's here to tell you the facts about fitness backed by years of experience.
Harry's experience allows him to understand the needs of athletes as well as the physical and psychological demands placed on them. The knowledge he has acquired through education and certifications gives him the ability to recognize and understand the application of human movement science.
channel.itunes:author: Harry Mitterbauer
channel.itunes:summary:
Our Host, Harry Mitterbauer, breaks down the common misconceptions in fitness by bringing on experts in every sport. Harry will not hesitate in telling you what you think is bull. He's here to tell you the facts about fitness backed by years of experience.

item.title: Runner's Dilemma Part 1
item.description: This episode brings on doctor of podiatric medicine, Dr. Daniel Altchuler to talk about how to get up off the couch and start running safely!
item.itunes:summary: This episode brings on doctor of podiatric medicine, Dr. Daniel Altchuler to talk about how to get up off the couch and start running safely!

item.title: Nutritional Supplements & Nutrient Infusion IV-Therapy
item.description:
Special guest Dr. Heath McAllister, ND and his expertise on the value of nutritional supplements and Nutrient Infusion IV-Therapy.
Dr. McAllister is a California licensed Naturopathic Doctor. He graduated summa cum laude from the University of New Hampshire and later with honors from Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine in Tempe, Arizona. He then went on to complete a general medicine residency. Dr. McAllister has served as faculty at several health-care institutions including Bastyr University in San Diego. Dr. McAllister combines the best of modern medicine with the most effective alternative therapies in order to offer a customized approach to each person’s health challenges specifically tailored to their individual needs. Dr. McAllister received specialized trained in Prolotherapy from the Hackett-Hemwall Foundation. Prolotherapy is a type of injection therapy designed to rehabilitate damaged tendons, ligaments, and joints as well as reduce pain. He finds this therapy extremely effective and one of the few that adequately addresses these issues. Dr. McAllister is originally from Maine where he was instilled with an intense fascination with nature. In his free time he enjoys foreign travel, cooking, hiking, and wildflower photography.

item.title: Functional Training with Ninja Warrior Travis Ross
item.description:
FUNCTIONAL TRAINING with special guest Travis Andre Ross, an American Ninja Warrior
Harry and Travis get into the weeds with functional training for athletes. Functional training is one of the oldest types of training around and imperative to any athlete's well-rounded fitness routine. What is functional training and how can you incorporate it into your own routine? Listen to find out.
Travis's Instagram: @travisandreross -- https://www.instagram.com/travisandreross

item.title: Trailer - Welcome to FitFacts
item.description:
An introduction to the world of FITFACTS as a PODCAST and its unlimited opportunity to educate and inform while keeping FACTS a key issue.
This introductory episode brings on Jonathan Marquez & Josh Archer, model & Ironman, to talk about their differences in fitness and nutrition.
Jonathan Marquez's Instagram: @beatsbyjon -- https://www.instagram.com/beatsbyjon
Josh Archer's Instagram: @josh_archer -- https://www.instagram.com/josh_archer
As a Sports Performance and Recovery Specialist for over 25 years, our host, Harry Mitterbauer, is using his experience and knowledge to address Fitness topics head on with his unique approach to cut the bull and get to the facts.
